Mrdka hra skurvena pičovina s cheatermi, sú tam ruskí kokoti ktorí nevedia po anglicky a keď nevieš hovoriť po rusky tak sa ani nedohovoríš. Chytiť každú hru cheatera je celkom sranda. Anti-cheat je ako lízať piču cez sklo. Odkedy je ta hra zadarmo absolútne ju neodporúčam. :)

I've been playing this game on and off for the past 6 years. Its not the best graphics-wise but it doesn't need to be. Playing this game all day for months is a bit difficult for me, i get burned out and I take a break. When I get back playing, I feel the same way as I have before taking the break. One of the reasons I like this game is how crispy it feels. Playing this game just feels good. Nothing beats a good competitive game of CS:GO whether it's with friends or solo. One thing that keeps driving me to play is the satisfaction of seeing improvement, no matter how slow. I still remembering the first time I got this game in a Counter Strike bundle. One of the best purchases I have ever made.

I have a thousand hours, and I hate this game with a passion.

It's glorious.

Dobrá hra až na obyvatele ruské destinace kteří ke svému velmi kvalitnímu gamepleji používají vulgární výrazy v ruském jazyce které konstantují do svého mikrofonu z lidlu. To mně trošičku štve. Ale co nespravý mute že ano :) 

A další věc jsou hackeři kteří nemají nic jiného na práci než se točit jak vrtule a dávat noscope hlavy.

Ale furt tuto hru hodnotím 10 rusáku z 10 (10/10)
